uk.co.intec.keyDatesApp.model
Class DocLinkListener

java.lang.Object
  org.openntf.osgiworlds.model.AbstractDocLinkListener
      uk.co.intec.keyDatesApp.model.DocLinkListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener, java.io.Serializable
public class DocLinkListener
extends AbstractDocLinkListener

Author:
Paul Withers Listener for Button links in views, to launch the relevant page with the relevant document (and potentially force edit mode).

Functionality on the relevant page needs to receive and process docId and editMode parameters in the enter method. Omit handling code on receiving page to disable that functionality.

Of course this could be extended to pass multiple documents or more!
See Also:
